1800 unused objects and rules on the network firewalls which removed manual steps and reduced their project time by 80 Engineered and executed a migration from QRadar SIEM to Graylog which resulted in vulnerability and resolution information Spearheaded a process to create scripts for evaluating Internet Information Services IIS security settings for auditors which scanned the 80 IIS servers for 150 settings eliminating user interaction and reducing audit time by 60 Conducted monthly vulnerability scans to assess the security of the network and communicate remediation recommendations to the
